tool.name: Advanced restitution: 'Routier'or 'Pedestre' protocols
tool.description: from Animal Detection on Acoustic Recordings
tool.command: Rscript '$__tool_directory__/BilanEnrichiRP.R' '$idc2' '$__tool_directory__/refRPSeuil50.csv' '$__tool_directory__/SpeciesList.csv' && tail -n +2 output-summaryRP.html > tmp && mv tmp output-summaryRP.html && tail -n +2 output-detailRP.html > tmp && mv tmp output-detailRP.html

param.name: idc2
param.label: Corrected and validated observation file
param.help: Use output file from 'Tadarida identifications integration' : a sampling session file corrected and validated. Routier or Pedestre protocol

param.name: output_choice
param.label: Select a summarised or detailed display
param.help: Chose whether your want a summarised or detailed display

tool.help:
**What it does**
The tool analyzes the observations made with the "Routier" or "Pedestre" protocols.
**Arguments**
- Input is an observation/participation file corrected by the tools Tadarida data cleaner and Tadarida identifications integration. - Outputs are Summary and details raw tabulars, and html visualisations.
